schema.description: Configure a status (Up/Down) switchover for global DHCPv6 server.
Configure a status (Up/Down) switchover for global DHCPv6 server.
Configure a status (Up/Down) switchover for global DHCPv6 server.

dhcpv6-server-property.description: Configure a status (Up/Down) switchover for a DHCPv6 server.

dead-count.description: Specify the maximum number of times at which the DHCPv6 server does not send response packets.

time-out.description: Specify a timeout period. If a device receives no response from the DHCPv6 server within the timeout period, it re-sends request packets.

dead-time.description: Specify a period within which the DHCPv6 server is down. After the dead-time, the DHCPv6 server is set to up.

send-solicit-speed.description: Configure the rate at which Solicit packets are sent to the DHCPv6 server.
Configure the rate at which Solicit packets are sent to the DHCPv6 server.

packet-number.description: Specify the number of Solicit packets that can be sent within a period.

ips.description: List of IPv6 addresses for DHCPv6 server.

ip.description: Configure IPv6 addresses for a DHCPv6 server.

ipv6-address.description: Specify the IPv6 address for a DHCPv6 server.

vpn-instance.description: Specify the name of a VPN instance. If DHCPv6 server belongs to the public network, vpn-instance can be defined as '_public_'.

interfaces.description: List of outbound interface for DHCPv6 server.

interface.description: Configure the outbound interface for DHCPv6 server.

name.description: Specify the outbound interface for a DHCPv6 server.
Specify the name of the DHCPv6 server group.

bind-servers.description: Configure IPv6 addresses or outbound interfaces and the load balancing weight for a DHCPv6 server.

destination-ips.description: List of IPv6 addresses and the load balancing weight for a DHCPv6 server.

destination-ip.description: Configure an IPv6 address and the load balancing weight for a DHCPv6 server.

ipv6-address.description: Specify the IPv6 address for a destination DHCPv6 server.

vpn-instance.description: Specify the name of a VPN instance. public network vpn-name value is '_public_'.

weight.description: Specify the load balancing weight for a DHCPv6 server.

interfaces.description: List of outbound interface and the load balancing weight for a DHCPv6 server.

interface.description: Configure an outbound interface and the load balancing weight for a DHCPv6 server.

name.description: Specify the outbound interface for DHCPv6 packets.

weight.description: Specify the load balancing weight for a DHCPv6 server.

server-source.description: Configure the source address for packets to be sent to the DHCPv6 server group.

source-address.description: Configure the source address for packets to be sent to the DHCPv6 server group.

link-address.description: Configures the source address, which is a link address of the prefix pool bound to a remote address pool.
Indicate that the source address is a link address of the prefix pool bound to a remote address pool.

if-name.description: Configures the type and number of the interface whose address is the source address.
Indicate the type and number of the interface whose address is the source address.

server-algorithm.description: Configure the algorithm for selecting DHCPv6 servers.

retransmit.description: Configure the device to transparently transmit retransmitted messages from users to the DHCPv6 server.

solicit.description: Enable/disable a BRAS to transparently transmit retransmitted Solicit messages from users to a DHCPv6 server while waiting for Advertise messages from the DHCPv6 server.

request.description: Enable/disable a BRAS to transparently transmit retransmitted Request messages from users to a DHCPv6 server while waiting for Reply messages from the DHCPv6 server.

release-agent.description: Configure the function of sending DHCPv6 release packets.

enable.description: Enable/disable the function of sending DHCPv6 release packets.

server-global-property.description: Configure a status (Up/Down) switchover for global DHCPv6 server.
